com.infopublic.mapper.select: SELECT ui.userid as userid, username, password, uname, usex, uphone, webchat, uemail, qq, ucardid, uaddress, companytype, companyname, companyaddress, ui.note as note, usid, us.aid as aid, aname, us.rid as rid, us.oid as oid, oname, us.menurights as menurights, us.buttonrights as buttonrights, skin, ischecked, checkpasstime, applyrole, isaccredit, unpassreason, us.isenabled as isenabled, rname, r.menurights as rolemenurights , r.buttonrights as rolebuttonrights from ((( ui LEFT JOIN us on ui.userid = us.userid) LEFT JOIN r on us.rid = r.rid) LEFT JOIN a on us.aid = a.aid) LEFT JOIN o on us.oid = o.oid where us.userid = #{userid}

SELECT ui.userid as userid, username, password, uname, usex, uphone, webchat, uemail, qq, companytype, companyname, companyaddress, us.aid as aid, aname, oname, ischecked, checkpasstime, applyrole, isaccredit, us.isenabled as isenabled, rname, us.rid as rid from (((( ui LEFT JOIN m on ui.userid = m.userid) LEFT JOIN us on ui.userid = us.userid) LEFT JOIN r on us.rid = r.rid) LEFT JOIN a on us.aid = a.aid) LEFT JOIN o on us.oid = o.oid
and us.aid in
${item}
or us.aid is null
and us.aid is null
and uname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.unamekey}),'%')
and us.oid =#{pd.oidkey}
and ischecked=4 order by checkpasstime desc
